DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate efficacy safety FG-4592 correction anemia non-dialysis chronic kidney disease patient .
DOC.brief_title: Study FG-4592 Non-Dialysis Chronic Kidney Disease Patients With Anemia
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18 75 year 2 . Chronic kidney disease , receive dialysis 3 . Body weight 45 140 kg 1 . Any clinically significant infection evidence underlie infection 2 . Positive following : human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) , antihepatitis C virus antibody ( antiHCV Ab ) 3 . History chronic liver disease 4 . New York Heart Association Class III IV congestive heart failure 5 . Myocardial infarction acute coronary syndrome within 12 week prior randomization 6 . History malignancy 7 . Chronic inflammatory disease could impact erythropoiesis ( e.g. , systemic lupus erythematosis , rheumatoid arthritis , celiac disease ) even currently remission 8 . History myelodysplastic syndrome , multiple myeloma , pure red cell aplasia 9 . History hemosiderosis , hemochromatosis polycystic kidney disease 10 . Active hemolysis diagnosis hemolytic syndrome 11 . Uncontrolled symptomatic secondary hyperparathyroidism 12 . Seizure disorder receive antiepilepsy medication 13 . Known bone marrow fibrosis 14 . Any prior schedule organ transplant 15 . Prior treatment FG4592 hypoxiainducible factor prolyl hydroxylase inhibitor 16 . History alcohol drug abuse
